name: ElementsOcean
author: ElementsOcean

sections.description:
ElementsOcean is a user-friendly Elementor plugin with necessary customization features and advanced functionalities.It will comes with a huge library of pre-designed templates and elements, all of which are fully customizable and can be easily adapted to your needs. With ElementsOcean, you can create beautiful websites in minutes, without having to code or hire a developer.

ElementsOcean is a comprehensive collection of Elementor addons that help you extend the functionality of the popular WordPress page builder. With over 50 different upcoming addons, ElementsOcean has something for everyone & it is the perfect solution for anyone who wants to create a beautiful website quickly and easily, without having to code.

Live Preview

ELEMENTSOCEAN ELEMENTOR WIDGET CORE FEATURES AT A GLANCE

  • Highly customizable
  • Multiple style options
  • Modern Design
  • Fully Responsive
  • Cross-Browser Compatible

ADVANCED ELEMENTOR WIDGET INSIDE ELEMENTSOCEAN

ElementsOcean is a set of Elementor addons that enhances the Elementor editor with additional customization options and functional widgets.

  • Slider With ElementsOcean Slider Widget, you can create any kind of slider you can imagine, with no coding required. Just drag and drop, and you’re done!

  • Icon Box With ElementsOcean icon box widget you can display a short brief about the services you provide or products you offer within boxes with customization options like icon type, badge, content, icon box container etc, Just drag and drop, and you’re done!

  • Team ElementsOcean team widget, that allows you to display information about your team members on your website. You can customize the colors and layout of the widget to match your website’s design.

  • Pricing ElementsOcean pricing widget that enables you to quickly and easily display the prices of products and services. It provides a lot of options to choose from and displays the best deals in a matter of seconds.

  • Testimonial ElementsOcean testimonial widget that allows you to showcase customer testimonials on your website in a beautiful, attention-grabbing way. With ElementsOcean, you can easily add customer testimonials to your website and display them in a slider or grid layout.

  • Post ElementsOcean post widget that allows you to display post content on your website. You can customize the colors and layout of the widget to match your website’s design.

  • Accordion ElementsOcean accordion widget that allows you to easily create beautiful and engaging accordions for your website or blog. With ElementsOcean, you can easily add text, and content to your accordions, and then customize their appearance to match your site’s look and feel. ElementsOcean is fully responsive, meaning that your accordions will look great on all devices, from desktop to mobile.

  • Tabs ElementsOcean tabs widget that allows you to easily create beautiful and engaging tabs for your website or blog. With ElementsOcean, you can easily add text, and content to your tabs, and then customize their appearance to match your site’s look and feel.

  • Progressbar ElementsOcean progress bar widget is the perfect way to display your progress on your website. With its sleek, modern design, it’s easy to see how much progress you’ve made at a glance. The widget is also highly customizable, so you can display your progress in the way that makes the most sense for you.

For more details :ElementsOcean.
sections.installation: Installation is fairly straight forward. Install it from the WordPress plugin repository.
sections.changelog:
1.0.3

  • Client carousel and testimonials added

1.0.2

  • Added Accordion and Tabs

1.0.1

  • Fixed Slider issue

1.0.0

  • Initial Release

short_description: ElementsOcean is a powerful add-on for Elementor that lets you quickly and easily create beautiful, responsive websites with stunning visual effects.
